attributes.action: make cyclists suffer the same penalties as motorists for identical offences. We are ALL road users, and all vehicles motorised or not can maim or kill when used irresponsibly or carelessly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently a cyclist was fined £2,000 for colliding with and killing a 17 year-old girl. If the offender had been a motorist, there would have also been either a driving ban, prison sentence or both.

Whether, a minor moving traffic offence, or one that results in injury or death, all road users should face the same penalties. Where cyclists are permitted to use the pavement, the same laws should apply to them as when they use the road.
